body.name: COLORPAPA Moroccan Area Rug 2x3 Washable Small Rug for Entryway Hallway Kitchen Bathroom Non-Slip Accent Distressed Floor Carpet, Grey Ivory
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 13 mins
features: [Machine Washable Rug]: This washable rug is easy to clean, Simply throw it in the machine for a quick wash, Your rug won’t shrink or wrinkle and colors will remain ever-vibrant thanks to enhanced technology.

[Non-Skid Rug]: This area rug uses the more expensive TPR backing (not PVC or glue) which is much stronger and durable for long-lasting use, unlike other brands where the rubber backing tends to wear and peel off after a number of washes. Note: No additional carpet pad is required, Make sure floors are dry underneath the rug to prevent the rug from slipping.

[Premium Quality and Softness]: You’ll be delightfully awed by the microfiber softness! Our washable rugs are 800gsm, that’s wonderfully thicker and softer than other brands! You’ll immediately see and feel the difference in quality and be delighted by the soft cashmere touch of your rug.

[Classic Design]: Our washable rugs come in vintage, boho, Moroccan, distressed, faded, traditional, modern, chic, and many more styles and are ideal for placement in the living room, dining room, kitchen, entryway, bedroom, bathroom, hallway. Charming and dreamy for your home!

[Easy Care Machine Washable]: Featuring gorgeous non-fade colors, your washable rug is easy to care for, Use a vacuum clean the dust hair to reduce the accumulation of dust; Deep cleaning can be washed and tumble dry below 200 degrees.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dress up your home with this Moroccan rug that will make your home shine!
A rug that can be machine washed, a rug that can be folded, and a rug that will surprise you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SOFTEST RUG- Toddler mess approved
reviews.reviewText: My carpet is old and has lots of stains from my oldest when she was little. I got this rug to cover all that. It's the SOFTEST rug with the most luxurious pad underneath. However... My toddler is a mess maker and enjoys pouring snacks and rinks on to the rug. His past times also include grinding already broken cookies and chips down into the fibers of the rug as well. Food pouches, gummy snacks, and crayons have also been dug, crushed, and otherwise discarded into and on to the rug as well. Once a week I pull up the rug, shake it out outside and stuff it into my top load 2015 model Roper washer. I even dry that sucker in my front load old as heck Maytag dryer. Fits easily, washes easily. and dries beautifully. Love this rug.I got a 5 x 7.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cozy Comfort for the Office: A 5 x 7ft Rug Review
reviews.reviewText: As a big fan of rugs, especially with hardwood floors, I recently added this 5 x 7ft rug to my office space, and it has quickly become a game-changer. The size is perfect for placing under my desk, providing a cozy solution to prevent cold feet during long working hours.One of the standout features of this rug is its impeccable fit for my office setup. The 5 x 7ft dimensions are just right for the space, adding a layer of comfort without overwhelming the room. The rug's placement under the desk has made a significant difference, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere in my workspace.The softness of the rug is truly exceptional. Every step on its surface feels like a treat for the feet. The plush texture adds an extra layer of comfort, making my office space not only functional but also a delight to spend time in. It's evident that the rug has been crafted with quality in mind, enhancing the overall experience.While the 5 x 7ft size works perfectly for my office, I appreciate the reviewer's suggestion for larger rugs in living rooms and bedrooms. This versatile rug, with its soft and lightweight qualities, could indeed be a fantastic addition to various living spaces.In conclusion, if you're in search of a rug that fits seamlessly into your office space, provides comfort, and has a soft and lightweight feel, this 5 x 7ft rug is an excellent choice. It has certainly elevated my workspace, and I would recommend it to anyone looking to enhance the coziness and aesthetics of their office or any room with hardwood floors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A really attractive and soft rug that feels like it will take a beating
reviews.reviewText: We're really pleased with this rug. Not only is it as attractive as the pictures on Amazon show, it's also has a lovely softness to it. It's nice and thick and well made. We had reservations about the lightness of the pattern and weather that will attract dirt, but it's still good looking after a month of heavy trampling and the fact that you can wash it is a real added bonus. A great rug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not High End
reviews.reviewText: I'm not impressed with this rug at all. It almost feels like a cheap blanket sewn onto nonslip backing, and this causes it to lay awkwardly and show folds and impressions very easily. I haven't washed it yet, and I am honestly a little nervous about doing so as it's by no means high quality. For the price point, I expected a much better product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This rug was true to color and design as compared to the pictures. It feels very soft to walk on and makes a huge difference on the wood floor in the winter. I like that it’s washable, although I have not tried that yet. I will probably bring it to a laundromat instead of using my washing machine at home. So far, I have really liked this rug, but if I had to point out an issue it would be with the weight. The rug is lightweight, which would seem to be an advantage, but makes it hard to vacuum. It’s light enough that the vacuum can pull and bunch it up in areas if you’re not careful. That’s a small price to pay for a nice looking rug that feels this soft I think.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great office rug
reviews.reviewText: I finally put this down in my home office and I love it! It IS super soft and velvety. It's not super thick but I was on the rug using some workout equipment and there was more than enough padding. I know it had been folded but I really don't see the fold marks and most washable type rugs come folded.I know using the vacuum can be a pain on smaller rugs but that is true even with super fancy smaller rugs. For this one, I've got a cat climber partially on it, a sewing machine table on one side, and a cat house on one side under my desk. As long as there is weight on it, it doesn't pull up.I've been using rugs lately, especially washable ones. We have cats (as noted by the cat stuff mentioned above) and they do track litter every so often. Our hardwood floors really need to be refinished also so the rugs help cover that. And by cat hair/litter/dust being held in the rug, the open hard wood places stay cleaner for longer!!I am very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very soft and very large
reviews.reviewText: This rug is perfect for your living room or a family area. It's super soft, I mean soft enough to lay on. It's extremely easy to clean as well. I was a bit worried at first because of the lighter colors and we do have pets. But so far, after a month of use there are no stains and it vacuums up well. It's large and made well but not extremely heavy so it's easy to move around and one person can do it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful rug perfect for familys
reviews.reviewText: The COLORPAPA Moroccan Machine Washable Rug has transformed my living space. The 5x7 size is perfect for my living room, and the grey Moroccan design adds a touch of elegance. The machine-washable feature makes maintenance a breeze, and the non-slip backing ensures safety. Whether in the bedroom, kitchen, or office, this rug provides a cozy and stylish addition. Highly recommended for those seeking a durable, non-slip, and visually appealing area rug.
